text: Sir Peter Geoffrey Hall, FBA (19 March 1932 â€“ 30 July 2014) was an English town planner and human geographer. He was the Bartlett Professor of Planning and Regeneration at The Bartlett, a Faculty of University College London. He was President of both the Town and Country Planning Association and the Regional Studies Association. He was elected a member of the Academia Europaea in 1989.
